channel.title: 508 Client Background!
channel.description: i am trying to change the background of my client for my 508 client. normal 508 client not hd! um... i don't see a picture file on folder so i am guessing it's in a file? please reply!

item.title: 508 Client Background!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, you need to add a sprite loader that replaces the background file. There are a few tutorials for it. Search for “Custom Sprites”
It’s not like a 317 client. It’s 508.

Read full topic
